Title: AN ACT TRANSFERRING THE BALANCES OF APPROPRIATIONS MADE BY ACTS NUMBERED SIXTEEN HUNDRED AND SIXTY-SIX. EIGHTEEN HUNDRED AND NINE, AND NINETEEN HUNDRED AND NINETY-ONE TO THE APPROPRIATION MADE BY ACT NUMBERED TWENTY-ONE HUNDRED AND NINETY-NINE, AND REDUCING THE APPROPRIATION OF THE LAST MENTIONED ACT IN AN EQUAL AMOUNT.
Data:
[ Act No. 2240, February 11, 1913 ]
AN ACT TRANSFERRING THE BALANCES OF APPROPRIATIONS MADE BY ACTS NUMBERED SIXTEEN HUNDRED AND SIXTY-SIX. EIGHTEEN HUNDRED AND NINE, AND NINETEEN HUNDRED AND NINETY-ONE TO THE APPROPRIATION MADE BY ACT NUMBERED TWENTY-ONE HUNDRED AND NINETY-NINE, AND REDUCING THE APPROPRIATION OF THE LAST MENTIONED ACT IN AN EQUAL AMOUNT.
By authority of the  United States, be it enacted by the Philippine Legislature, that:
Section 1.(awÞhi( The unexpended balances in the Insular Treasury of appropriations made by Acts Numbered Sixteen hundred and sixty-six, Eighteen hundred and nine, and Nineteen hundred and ninety-one, and all accretions thereto by reason of interest payments, or other causes, are hereby directed to be transferred to the appropriation made by Act Numbered Twenty-one hundred and ninety-nine and made available for all the purposes enumerated in that
Section 2. The appropriation of five hundred thousand pesos made by Act Numbered Twenty-one hundred and ninety-nine is hereby reduced in an amount equal to the accretions which it will receive by operation of the preceding section.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its passage.
Enacted, February 11, 1913.
